subject: Re: shipping to Argentina
description_text:
They haven't answered my question, when do they plan to send it?

> El 14 oct. 2025, a la(s) 05:33, service@simsonn.com escribió:
> 
> We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We have just concluded an eight-day holiday period, which has consequently delayed your shipment

conversations.body_text: Hello, we will ship to Argentina via DHL or FedEx.

﻿
﻿

 Hello, good afternoon. I have an order placed under the number SSN2880  , I want to know the tracking number, thank you.

> El 7 oct. 2025, a la(s) 05:16, service@simsonn.com escribió:
> ﻿
> Hello, we will ship to Argentina via DHL or FedEx.
> 4511:4206036

Hi TryerFpv,    We've just wrapped up our 8-day holiday and have a large backlog of orders to ship. We'll arrange your shipment as soon as possible and dispatch it within the next couple of days. Thank you for your understanding.

Hello, good morning. I wanted to know what happened with the shipping of my purchase. It's been a week now and I still haven't received the tracking number.

> El 9 oct. 2025, a la(s) 04:58, service@simsonn.com escribió:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi TryerFpv,
> 
> We've just wrapped up our 8-day holiday and have a large backlog of orders to ship. We'll arrange your shipment as soon as possible and dispatch it within the next couple of days. Thank you for your understanding.
> 
> 
> 
>

​  Hello, your tracking number has been generated. However, we must first deliver the parcel to our logistics provider, who will then ship it to Argentina. Consequently, there has been no update at this time.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01213002599

Hello, does it take more than a week to deliver the package to the carrier? Your website says 1 or 2 days.

> El 14 oct. 2025, a la(s) 04:09, service@simsonn.com escribió:
> 
> ﻿
> ​
> Hello, your tracking number has been generated. However, we must first deliver the parcel to our logistics provider, who will then ship it to Argentina. Consequently, there has been no update at this time.
> https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01213002599
> 
> 
> 
>
Hi TryerFpv,      We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We have just concluded an eight-day holiday period, which has consequently delayed your shipment.

Hi, could you tell me when my order will be shipped? And I know you were on vacation, and that's the same response you gave to a colleague who placed their order on 9/29.

> El 14 oct. 2025, a la(s) 05:33, service@simsonn.com escribió:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi TryerFpv,
> 
> We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We have just concluded an eight-day holiday period, which has consequently delayed your shipment.
> 
>
Hi TryerFpv,    Your order has been dispatched. We expect to provide you with the international tracking number in approximately two days, with delivery anticipated around the 22nd.
ID 为 4511 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4511  
      主题: shipping to Argentina  
      描述:  Hello, good afternoon. I would like to know if shipping to Argentina is by state mail or a private mail service, such as DHL or similar. Thank you very much.

Hello, good morning, do you have the international tracking number for my
purchase?

El mié, 15 oct 2025 a la(s) 6:18 a.m., service@simsonn.com (
service@simsonn.com) escribió:

> Hi TryerFpv,
>
> Your order has been dispatched. We expect to provide you with the
> international tracking number in approximately two days, with delivery
> anticipated around the 22nd.
>
>
Hi TryerFpv,    This is your UPS shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1Z01E9E16700182276

Hello, good morning. They sent me an international tracking number for my order. The package hasn't left China yet. I bought it on October 7th with a 5-8 business day delivery. The tracking website says estimated delivery is October 30th.
Hello, good evening, I have a problem with your shipment. It is scheduled for the 22nd of this month, and it is still at the origin. I want to know what the problem is and if I will receive it.
​  We are processing your request. Please wait.
Hi TryerFpv,  Your shipping status has been updated. Please don't worry.
